II. You and I are husband and wife. For that reason, and out of my natural affection for you, and out of affection, and with the main intention of bringing you some permanent benefit, for your important conveniences, and considering love as the reward, I have decided to give you the immovable property detailed in the third paragraph of this Schedule below, free of charge, free of charge, in my absolute possession, in the possession of all the immovable property that has come to me as an inheritance, in my absolute possession, in the possession of all the immovable property that has been in my absolute possession up to this day, in which no one else has any right, and in which no one else has any right, and this settlement deed has been written in your name. It has also been decided to give the said property to you free of charge, free of charge. From now on, you shall transfer the title deed of the property in your name, pay taxes, etc. in your name, and enjoy the property freely and happily with all the rights of your son, grandson, and family inheritance, giving, selling, and donating. From now on, neither I, my heirs, nor my subjects, nor you, your heirs, nor your subjects, shall ever cause any kind of dispute or hindrance. I hereby give you this settlement deed with my full consent in the presence of the following witnesses. Doo

Details :- Vizianagaram District, Kothavalasa Sub. Ri, Yilaka Lakkavarapukottai
Mandal, Relligavirammapet Revenue Village (part of Gram Kantham Survey No. 68 included in Residential
Area) measuring 84.77 sq.m. or
71.20 sq.m. for vacant land measuring:
East to West 14 ells or 4.27 m..

North to South: 54.5 ells 5 16.6220110s..

Boundaries:
East: Pinisetty Kishtappa Gari's slab house and vacant land
South: Pachakkala Ramalakshmi Gari's slab house
West: Dwarapudi Nageswara Rao's slab house and vacant land
North: Panchayat CC Road
The above measurements are the space between the boundaries This settlement deed is to be executed for the place of settlement and the said property shall be taken over immediately.
Declaration
This property is not an assigned land as per the Andhra Pradesh Assigned Lands Act 9/1977. There are no plantations like coconut, sapota, betel nut, stone mines like granite, other electrical equipment or other structures on this land. This land does not belong to the Wharf Board, tribal area, government and endowment lands and I hereby agree to be prosecuted in court under sections 27 and 64 of the Indian Stamp Act for concealing the facts in this matter.

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No 5972 of 2022 dated 28/Sep/2022, executed by Dwarapudi Ramu in favour of his Wife, Dwarapudi Sanyasamma, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 84.77 Sq. Yds, comprised in survey number 68 part situated in Relligavirammapeta Revenue Village, Lakkavarapukota Mandal, within the District of Vizianagarm registered at sub-registrar office Kothavalasa(205) is bounded as follows: North by: Panchayat C.C. Road South by: Slab house of Patchakala Ramalakshmi East by: Slab house and vacant site of Pinisetty Krishnappa West by: Slab house and vacant site of Dwarapudi Nageswara Rao Note:: Schedule property is part of Gramakantam as per deed.
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:: It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
